preference.name: TechnicalPortfolioTransferMode_IMAN_MEWorkInstruction
preference.preference_description: Used for configuring Teamcenter manufacturing process management technical portfolios. Defines the transfer mode of the specified technical portfolio. TransferMode objects control the related data exported into a PLM XML document. Valid values are Accepts a single string as a value. Must be a valid Teamcenter TransferMode object.
